transcript: if you're scrolling on Instagram right now and you're watching all these advice videos most times you don't need it because what most people are looking for is permission not advice because we already know what to do the person who has the most context to your situation isn't the person on the screen but you who's watching it and so you know what you need to do if you want to get in shape you probably know you should lift some weights eat a little bit less crap right move around more you probably know the things to do but we delay the first action and so when the best piece of advice I ever got was take my own advice
